thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com | 4 of 73
thread.title: Ken
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Ken

author: Ken
title: Ken
text: Had a small problem with the original product. It was a subtle issue that a less responsive company might have pushed-back. Received personal assistance from POTV staff (Jerry). In addition to making the situation right Jerry provided guidance on how to get the most out of the product. This was one of the best customer service experiences I have had. Highly recommended.
